page.title: 03Day in the Life of an Adult
page.content: My Mum is a teacher in Chorleywood. She has to leave home at eight thirty to get to school. She usually wears a skirt, a shirt, a jumper and high-heeled shoes. She usually shops at lunchtime. She leaves school at twenty past three. On her way home she picks me up. When she gets home she reads the paper and marks her books. She cooks the family supper at about seven o'clock. After that she runs my brother and myself to an activity such as badminton or golf. When she comes home she watches the television or she does the ironing. She quite often phones up one of her friends. Often she takes the dog for a walk or she does some gardening. Sometimes she has a bath in the evening. At ten thirty my Mum goes up to bed.
